participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, Emily enjoys exploring stories and meeting interesting people. She values the support of her family and finds solace in her pets.
participant_1.background: My family is supportive of my career choices. I ride my bicycle every day to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus on my writing. I met the most interesting people while filming my documentary. I think my pets are the best things in my life. I like alternative rock.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and energetic, Mark thrives on new experiences and enjoys sharing his music with others. He places a strong emphasis on family and has a playful spirit.
participant_2.background: I love the fact that my job allows me to travel and meet new people. I love playing guitar but sometimes I spend too much time practicing and not enough time with my family. I'm a fast driver in my red car. I love listening to music while I work in my flower shop, it helps me get in the zone. I am a grandparent at 44.

content.text: Hi, I'm a documentarian, do you have any interesting life stories?
Yeah, I'm a professional guitarist and I've traveled all over the world performing.
That's awesome! How did you get into guitar?
My dad played guitar so I grew up around it. He taught me how to play when I was a kid.
That's great that you have a family member who shared their passion with you.
Yeah, it's really nice. I love spending time with my family. My mom loves to garden so I help her out in her flower shop sometimes.
That's really cool. I'm not much of a gardener but I do enjoy listening to music.
Me too. I love listening to music while I'm working. It helps me get in the zone.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different types of music but my favorite is alternative rock
